translation.aboutUs-what-p: DRB is a Saudi application that specializes in building services. Because quality is our standard, we are keen at DRB to provide a unique customer experience
translation.aboutUs-where-p: DRB is in your neighborhood to provide services
translation.aboutUs-why-p: We aim to provide a unique customer experience through a variety of services for buildings, payment options, and continuous service developments.
translation.refer-subtitle: GET FREE CREDIT Share your referral code with friends and family! Share the link to give your friend SAR 20 off their booking! Once they use it to book, you will automatically receive SAR 20 credit added to your account! Now that's what we call a win-win!
translation.contactUs-youCanContact: You can contact us via below apps
translation.contactUs-forSuggestions: For suggestions and complaints please contact us by using social media app below
translation.privacy-description: Our use of the DRB application and provision of your personal information is deemed an approval of the terms indicated within this agreement. The phrase “the establishment” or “we” shall mean Haris Albait establishment., which is registered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, while “you” or “the user” shall mean any person who uses the “DRB” application. If you do not agree to these terms, you must stop using the Application.
translation.privacy-safeText: While you browse the store, we will not collect any of your personal data, except when you decide to use the service and benefit therefrom, and not just for the purpose of browsing and discovery. If you use the service, you must be assured that we do our best to protect your personal data and prevent illegal or unauthorized access as much as possible, we also protect the same from processing, alteration and loss. Although we use various protection measures and work to improve them, no system or technology can remain completely safe from damage, therefore, if you find any vulnerability within the application, you can contact us to resolve that issue through the following email help@DRB.com
translation.privacy-payment: How does e-payment processing in the app work?
translation.privacy-paymentText: DRB uses a trustworthy third party to process the e-payments. Such a third party may request information about your credit card and ask you to access your contact list.
translation.privacy-personal: Do we share your personal data with any third party?
translation.privacy-personalText: The privacy of DRB users is one of the most important things that we are keen to protect using all possible means, as we do not sell such data, nor disclose or share the same with any third party for any reason whatsoever. We collect such data for statistical purposes only, e.g. the number of users and their location.
translation.privacy-powers: What are the powers needed from the user?
translation.privacy-powersText: Access the phone’s state: as requested by a third party to complete the e- payment process in the application. Access the camera: a picture of an address, car, building, apartment, or any other service that required a picture. Access the users’ accounts: to customize the user experience, access your location to facilitate the location of the service and calculate the time required to reach your address, access the Internet.
translation.privacy-modify: The Right to modify the privacy policy
translation.privacy-modifyText: DRB shall have the full right, at any time, to update its privacy policy, whether by adding or deleting new terms or amending current ones.
translation.privacy-update: How do we notify DRB users of any update in the Terms of Use?
translation.privacy-updateText: We do not notify you about any updates to the Terms of Use through notifications or emails, however you can always know any updates by reviewing the date of the last update of such terms as indicated in the last line on this page. The last update: 1/11/2022
